overview: Daniel Weisbeck joined Netbiscuits in 2012 as CMO and is responsible for overall marketing strategy and execution. He is charged with evolving all aspects of Netbiscuits global marketing activities. Daniel draws on over 20 years of international technology marketing experience in senior roles. Most recently, he served as Vice President of Marketing in the EMEA region at Polycom. Daniel helped build the strategic vision of new and existing business for companies such as Corel, VisionTe and 3dfx. Daniel holds a B.A. in Mass Communication from the University of Minnesota and is based in Netbiscuits’ London office.
